personal.title: Cybersecurity Enthusiast
personal.bio: I am a passionate Cybersecurity student with a strong interest in ethical hacking, network security, and threat analysis. I enjoy learning how systems work and identifying vulnerabilities to improve security. I am building hands-on projects using tools like Nmap, Wireshark, and Linux to strengthen my practical skills. My goal is to start my career as a Security Analyst.
